(8)扰码器(scrambler):/解扰码器(disscrambler)  目的为了防止信元假同步,应避免比特流中出现连续0.因此,对信头以外的净荷部分,发送方进行扰码,接收方进行扰码.

entry.def: A scrambler is an electronic device which alters the sound of a radio or telephone message so that it can only be understood by someone who has special equipment.

means.word_mean: 1. a rapid mover; someone who scrambles;

sentences.sentence: "scramblers can often unnerve a better tennis player"

means.word_mean: 2. a lightweight motorcycle equipped with rugged tires and suspension; an off-road motorcycle designed for riding cross country or over unpaved ground
3. electronic equipment that makes speech unintelligible during transmission and restores it at reception
